attributes.action: Make Kelloggs bring back 'Banana Bubbles' cereal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banana Bubbles were a much loved kids breakfast cereal which were unjustly discontinued by kelloggs, possibly at the behest of Tehran or other Middle Eastern dictatorships. To not bring them back would be merely letting the terrorists win

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
